content: this hat fits a newborn but due to the stretchy nature of the ribbing and the versatility of the brim it should fit any child for quite some time i know it goes up to at least 18 months this pattern was corrected february 1 2008 larger format archived link 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20080202123700/http //the-shizknit blogspot com/2007/09/free-pattern-little-boy-blue-ribbed-hat html
